directions: Press into 12 muffin pan cups sprayed with cooking spray. Use back of spoon to make indentation in center of each. Place muffin pan on foil-covered rimmed baking sheet.
Bake 20 to 25 min. or until meatloaves are done (160 degrees F).
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can RO*TEL Diced Tomatoes and Green Chilies, undrained
title: Spicy Cheesy Mini Meatloaves
